name: npm_deno
description: Deno installer to node_modules via npm for adoption and node-based CI pipeline usage

scripts.force-install: npm run winstall || npm run posixstall || npm run poswgetall
scripts.install: npm run curlinstall || npm run wgetinstall || npm run psinstall
scripts.winstall: npm run iswin && PowerShell -Command "$env:DENO_INSTALL='%CD%\bin'; iwr https://deno.land/x/install/install.ps1 -useb | iex"
scripts.posixstall: npm run isnotwin && export DENO_INSTALL="${PWD}" && npm run curlinstall
scripts.poswgetall: npm run isnotwin && export DENO_INSTALL="${PWD}" && npm run wgetinstall
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: TamusJRoyce
